TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WSFederationSerializer extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供方法來將 WS-Federation 訊息轉換為 WS-Trust 通訊協定特定的 和 物件。

span.span: Provides methods to convert a WS-Federation message to and objects, which are WS-Trust protocol specific.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

Public Sub New ()
public: WSFederationSerializer();

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新的執行個體將 WS-同盟訊息序列化 Ws-trust Feb 2005 通訊協定訊息。執行個體類別用來序列化要求和執行個體類別用來序列化回應。The new instance serializes WS-Federation messages into WS-Trust Feb 2005 protocol messages; an instance of the class is used to serialize requests and an instance of the class is used to serialize responses.

summary.span: 根據回應 XML 的命名空間名稱，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class based on the namespace of the response XML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要求和回應訊息序列化為基礎的回應 （適當的 Ws-trust 序列化程式會使用根據命名空間） 的 XML 命名空間。The request and response messages are serialized based on the namespace of the response XML (the appropriate WS-Trust serializers are used based on the namespace).
